ygData.subject: Re: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This works for me. I ve been bound in the bank in Freeport since the cleric I work with hit 29.  I ve died all over Norrath and all I have to do is click
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Mike.Langlois@...

>Lastly, I've heard some say that using a 29th or higher cleric to res you
>is the
>answer. But really, if that were true, nobody at all should get bind.


This works for me. I've been bound in the bank in Freeport since the cleric
I work with hit 29. I've died all over Norrath and all I have to do is
click yes and I'm back at my corpse.

The thing is, my planes trip aside, it'd been 3 levels since I'd died. I
lost the bard hate thing about level 25 and even when I want bard hate to
kick in it doesn't (unless its low enough I can charm it).

If you are on Sol Ro, send me a tell, maybe I could help in that regard.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 49 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
Anthem
Level 2 Bard of Qeynos
Innoruuk
